trends: There has been one other sighting in Archbold
There were no other sightings in Archbold on or around November 30th 1983
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were laying on our backs in a vacant field next tour our house,resting after playing some football. It was a late summer-time dusk. We bothobserved a three pointed craft, moving from south to north at a steady speed andwithout sound. Our first thought was that it was a conventional aircraft. However, there were NO blinking lights, such as one would expect on an aircraft,and NO engine sound whatsoever. There was one steady white light at each cornerof the craft, and a black triangle-shaped expanse in between. As the craftpassed under a star, the stars light was blocked out. The craft disappearedfrom view on the northern horizon. We went home and reported this sighting toour parents. Both of us remember this event to this day, as do our parents.
Summary: Black Triangles Seen in Fulton Co.
